page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content:
The airlines that use the airport are; Dan Air,Air UK,Guernsey Airlines,KLM, Jersey European Airways,British Midland,cargo and private planes.
{ROADS LANES AND CLIFF PATHS}
The roads in this area are on average about 8 metres wide with single lane traffic and pavements about one metre in width. the roads are kept in giid repair by the States giving good access to the coast, west of the island and airport.
The lanes in the area especially those leading to the coast are very narrow leaving only enough room for one car but with many give way points along the way. These roads are kept in good repair and although they are narrow all tourists and residents in
